trans-unit.source: Manages the overflow behavior of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia o comportamento de estouro de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: If there are more overflow items than can be displayed on the form, use the [ToolStrip Items Collection Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e681f3ab-94ba-4b2b-ac64-1dfad46caa25) to manage this situation.
trans-unit.target: Se houver mais itens de estouro que podem ser exibidas no formulário, use o [Editor de coleção de itens de ToolStrip](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e681f3ab-94ba-4b2b-ac64-1dfad46caa25) para gerenciar essa situação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> from which to derive this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> do qual derivar essa instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow" /> class derived from a base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow" /> derivada de uma base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto de acessibilidade para o controle.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> para o controle.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se você não chamar explicitamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método, ele será chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> propriedade é referenciada.

trans-unit.source: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Para obter ou definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> propriedade, você deve adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assembly instalado com o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classes to expose accessible information.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a criação de um gráfico com suporte a acessibilidade de controle, usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classes para expor informações acessíveis.

trans-unit.source: The control plots two curves along with a legend.
trans-unit.target: O controle plota duas curvas junto com uma legenda.

trans-unit.source: The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control.
trans-unit.target: O `ChartControlAccessibleObject` classe que deriva de `ControlAccessibleObject`, é usado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método para fornecer informações acessíveis personalizadas para o controle de gráfico.

trans-unit.source: Since the chart legend is not an actual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information.
trans-unit.target: Como a legenda do gráfico não é um real <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> -com base em controle, mas em vez disso, é desenhado pelo controle do gráfico, ele faz não todas as informações acessíveis internas.

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A> method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend.
trans-unit.target: Por isso, o `ChartControlAccessibleObject` substituições de classe a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A> método para retornar o `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` que representa informações acessíveis para cada parte da legenda.

trans-unit.source: When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information.
trans-unit.target: Quando um aplicativo acessível ciente usa esse controle, o controle pode fornecer as informações necessárias de acessíveis.

trans-unit.source: This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse trecho de código demonstra substituindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class overview for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> visão geral da classe para o exemplo de código completo.

trans-unit.source: Gets all of the items that are currently being displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém todos os itens que estão sendo exibidos no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> that includes all items on this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> que inclui todos os itens neste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.DisplayedItems%2A> property to get everything the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> currently displays, including items the user did not add, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.DisplayedItems%2A> propriedade de obter tudo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> exibe no momento, incluindo os itens que o usuário não adicionou, como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.Items%2A> property to get all items on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, including those not being displayed.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.Items%2A> propriedade para obter todos os itens na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, inclusive aqueles não estão sendo exibidos.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: A área com tamanho personalizado de um controle.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o tamanho de uma área retangular na qual um controle pode ser ajustado.

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um par ordenado de tipo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa a largura e a altura de um retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Gets all of the items on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, whether they are currently being displayed or not.
trans-unit.target: Obtém todos os itens no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, caso eles estejam sendo exibidos ou não.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> containing all of the items.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> que contém todos os itens.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.Items%2A> property to get all items on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, including those not being displayed.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.Items%2A> propriedade para obter todos os itens na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, inclusive aqueles não estão sendo exibidos.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.DisplayedItems%2A> property to get only those items that are currently displayed on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.DisplayedItems%2A> propriedade para obter somente os itens que estão atualmente exibidos a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: Passes a reference to the cached <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine" /> returned by the layout engine interface.
trans-unit.target: Passa uma referência para o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine" /> armazenado em cache retornado pela interface do mecanismo de layout.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> that represents the cached layout engine returned by the layout engine interface.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> que representa o mecanismo de layout em cache retornado pela interface do mecanismo de layout.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.OnLayout%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.OnLayout%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: Resets the collection of displayed and overflow items after a layout is done.
trans-unit.target: Redefine a coleção de itens exibidos e de estouro após a conclusão de um layout.
